targets.rawSql:
WITH (
  SELECT max(height) FROM validators_signatures WHERE chain_id = '${chain_id}'
) AS max_height
SELECT
  height,
  address,
  signed
FROM validators_signatures
WHERE height >= max_height - 40 AND chain_id = '${chain_id}' AND address != ''
ORDER BY height ASC
